statements: SELECT * FROM research_publications;
SELECT publication_id, title, authors FROM research_publications WHERE topic = 'Machine Learning';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM research_publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_publications WHERE citation_count > 100 ORDER BY citation_count DESC;
SELECT publication_id, title, authors, citation_count FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date;
SELECT * FROM research_publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC, citation_count DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT title, publication_date, citation_count FROM research_publications WHERE topic='Machine Learning' AND citation_count > 100 ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT title, authors[1], publication_date FROM research_publications WHERE citation_count BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT publication_id, title, authors, publication_date FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01' AND topic='Data Science';
SELECT * FROM research_publications WHERE authors @> ARRAY['John Doe'] ORDER BY citation_count DESC, publication_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM research_publications;
SELECT title, authors FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT publication_id, title FROM research_publications ORDER BY citation_count DESC;
SELECT publication_id, citation_count FROM research_publications WHERE citation_count BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM publication_citations WHERE citing_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY citation_count DESC;
SELECT publication_id, title, citation_count FROM research_publications WHERE authors LIKE '%John Doe%' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT publication_id, title, authors FROM research_publications WHERE citation_count > 100 ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT publication_id, title, citation_count FROM research_publications WHERE citation_count BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT citation_id, publication_id, cited_by, citing_date FROM publication_citations WHERE citing_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-01-01' ORDER BY publication_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM research_publications;
SELECT title, authors, publication_date FROM research_publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, citation_count FROM research_publications WHERE citation_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM research_citations INNER JOIN research_publications ON research_citations.publication_id = research_publications.publication_id;
SELECT full_name, organization, research_interests FROM researchers WHERE organization = 'ABC University';
SELECT * FROM research_publications WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT title, authors FROM research_publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT publication_id, title, authors, citation_count FROM research_publications WHERE citation_count > 50 ORDER BY citation_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT authors FROM research_publications;
SELECT publication_id, title FROM research_publications WHERE title LIKE '%data%' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM ResearchPublications;
SELECT publication_title, author_name FROM ResearchPublications WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT publication_title, author_name FROM ResearchPublications WHERE author_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT publication_id, publication_title, publication_abstract FROM ResearchPublications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, author_affiliation FROM Authors WHERE author_email LIKE '%.edu';
SELECT * FROM ResearchPublications WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT publication_title, author_name FROM ResearchPublications WHERE author_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT publication_title, publication_date FROM ResearchPublications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS publication_count FROM ResearchPublications GROUP BY author_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT publication_title, citation_text FROM ResearchPublications JOIN Citations ON ResearchPublications.publication_id = Citations.publication_id;
SELECT * FROM Research_Papers;
SELECT title, authors FROM Research_Papers ORDER BY publication_year DESC;
SELECT publication_year, title FROM Research_Papers WHERE publication_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2015;
SELECT paper_id, title, keywords FROM Research_Papers WHERE keywords LIKE '%machine learning%';
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE affiliation = 'University of California';
SELECT title, authors, publication_year FROM Research_Papers WHERE publication_year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM Citations WHERE citation_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT title, affiliation FROM Publications JOIN Researchers ON Publications.researcher_id = Researchers.researcher_id;
SELECT DISTINCT researcher_id, name, email FROM Researchers WHERE affiliation = 'University X';

SELECT r.name AS researcher_name, p.title AS publication_title, c.citation_text AS citation FROM Researchers r JOIN Publications p ON r.researcher_id = p.researcher_id JOIN Citations c ON p.publication_id = c.paper_id;
